Reviews.Title: Good basic point and shoot camera
Reviews.Author: D. Lewis
Reviews.Content: The FE-20 is a good point and shoot camera.  It has a nice size preview screen that makes it easy to see your shot.  It has good color nice sizing and responds well to all kinds of light levels.  I really like the preview screen, it nice size.  I bought this camera to replace the old point and shoot camera and my wife loves it.  She likes the menu better and says it much easier to use.  She is not one to take a lot of picture because the old camera was not "user friendly" for her, but this one is very "friendly".

Reviews.Title: Worth the Money
Reviews.Author: DFOX "DFOX"
Reviews.Content: This is a point and shoot camera. I have needed one for a while and picked one up at Staples for [...] after rebate! It is worth every bit of what I paid, easy interface, long lasting rechargeable battery, and USB cable and charger. Cant beat the price. If you are looking for a replacement for those [...] a shot disposables and want to upgrade to a nice digital with competitive zoom, this is it.

Reviews.Title: Best Super Slim 8 MP Digital Camera under $ 200 Dollars
Reviews.Author: S. Kelly
Reviews.Content: Super sharp crystal clear pictures. Great Color. Nice large LCD viewing screen Fits easy into your shirt pocket with room to spare. Pictures can be blown up to poster size and still remain sharp. Best Value of super slim cameras under $ 200 out there and it is a 8 megapixel you find in top end cameras. Bought 1 for girlfriend because she kept borrowing mine.

Reviews.Title: not so bad but expected better
Reviews.Author: Eric N. Reyes "ekala"
Reviews.Content: Well there's good and bad with this camera. One thing is if you set the picture quality on "normal" you will get somewhat fuzzy or blurry photos like some others have said, although your picture files won't be so large size in megabytes. With quality set on "fine" the pictures are decent, but file size is large, almost too large. Colors on some photos sometimes come out too reddish. Outdoor movies can come out horrible, very red, overall this is not a good movie camera, Samsungs tend to be very good for movies. Battery life is very good, drain it at least once and then fully charge, it will improve. Good small size and fairly easy to use, everything else is OK.

Reviews.Title: Horrible
Reviews.Author: CRG
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera to take pictures of architecture models because of its small focal length. Basically, don't even try to take a picture inside, it will never look good, grainy, blurry, all the colors are completely wrong, it creates warmer tones even with the white balance set to cooler. Recently I've tried to set up simple timelapses, (10-12 pictures a day for a week) and it even fails at that! Although I'm using a tripod and self timer it still comes out grainy.If you are looking to use this camera for simple point and shoot photography it still sucks! The battery life is miniscule and the included charger takes over an hour to charge.In Conclusion: DO NOT BUY THIS CAMERA there are many others on the market that will fair you better

Reviews.Title: Poor battery life
Reviews.Author: craig sommerfield
Reviews.Content: Olympus FE-20.  The battery life lasts maybe 2-3 pictures, and if you use the flash - then less. (my experience).  I would have taken it back, but I can't find the receipt. Went top the Olympus web site and I wasn't able to buy a replacement battery - actually I honestly believe that something is wrong with the mfg "run" that caused this problem. I went to "Olympus FE-20 battery problems" and I found other folks that are experiencing this same problem.

Reviews.Title: Beats the Stores every time!
Reviews.Author: Darren C. Nesbitt
Reviews.Content: Ok so this was a gift for my friend. We needed a camera with at least 8 pixels, and USES NO BATTERIES (charges are best)and we found this.It was great. and the seller sent it very quickly. I think we ordered it on friday and I got it monday. lol

Reviews.Title: Great Outdoors Camera!
Reviews.Author: S. A. ROBBINS "shirley_rw"
Reviews.Content: We used this camera on our boat to take pictures of our grandkids tubing behind the boat and the pictures came out Great! And we were doing 20-30 mph on a slightly choppy water, the Image Stabilization works fantastic. We even took zoomed pictures of the kids on the tube behind the boat and I could not believe how good the pictures came out. We bought it elsewhere for under $100 and it is a great value for the money. It is nice and slim, I like the lens cover that closes automatically when you shut the camera off and the battery lasts quite awhile. I put a 2gb card in the camera and it says it will take over 500 pictures. The only thing you need to know is that the USB has to be plugged directly into the computer and not through a USB hub! At first I could not transfer images so I called Olympus and they explained this and when I plugged directly into the computer, it worked just fine. Highly recommended but shop around for deals.

Reviews.Title: Exactly as advertised
Reviews.Author: Cuyler Griffith
Reviews.Content: After some research on current camera offerings, I decided to go with this one.  And Amazon had the lowest price on the net.  Product arrived faster than expected, was well packed, and had all the equipment that goes with it.

Reviews.Title: very good service
Reviews.Author: Chana Fox
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with this product. I have not had it long enough to know if there are any problems. It is not the best camera but for the price it is very good.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera more than expected
Reviews.Author: AmazonReviewer
Reviews.Content: This a excellent camera for the price and alot of features.Great pictures and videos and a print button. I couldn't get anything better for the buck. I can't wait until I get another camera from olympus. Fast shipping it came the 15th instead of the 30th!! Great point and shoot camera!!

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: robert dallas
Reviews.Content: I own now two of these camera's they are perfect for just about anything and they have such beautiful color!

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera
Reviews.Author: JerryCPP "Sonex Builder"
Reviews.Content: This is the second of this model I have purchased.  The first one died a violent death, and I missed it so much I ordered another. It uses the XD card, the same as my FUJI SLR, so I can switch cards.  It is easy to use, and fits in your pocket.  The only down side is the lag time.  Don't expect to catch a runner in mid-stride.  By the time it finally takes the photo, he or she will be two steps down the track.

Reviews.Title: Will get a different camera
Reviews.Author: Linda
Reviews.Content: The camera does take nice pictures and it is great when traveling because it fits in a pocket. BUT, the battery life is horrible. Whether I use OEM batteries or generic, it is the same. You get a very short battery life, it seems that if the battery is in the camera even with the camera off, the battery life is being used. I have 4 batteries with me at all times and it is not enough for a day of sightseeing. I will be purchasing a different pocket camera.

Reviews.Title: Olympus Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Emilypatricia
Reviews.Content: Great little camera! I love it! Quality of pictures is good, design is user friendly and it fits anywhere, even in little clutch purses.

Reviews.Title: NOT SO GREAT FOR MAKING VIDEOS
Reviews.Author: amanda l
Reviews.Content: when i bought this camera i thought it was pretty decent because it took pictures very well and you get to see it on the camera in 1 second; it's very fast. but i love to make videos and when i did i was very disappointed that the comera does not produce sound; you only hear sound when you put the video on your computer which is what the instructions say.

Reviews.Title: I Love This Camera!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Peklly
Reviews.Content: I love this camera.  The quality is great.  Pictures are clear and sharp.  The size of the camera is convenient.  I would recommend this camera to everyone!

Reviews.Title: they could'nt sell this camera to me
Reviews.Author: J. Bauer
Reviews.Content: I only had the camera for about a week but returned it immediately because the picture quality was so poor.  Grainy and blurry.  Also, it took forever between pictures so forget spontaneous shots.  Even worse w/ the flash.  I wouldn't waste your money but even more so, any frustration on this camera.  Too bad, I used to like Olympus.

Reviews.Title: Worse Camera I've ever had
Reviews.Author: Larima Lindsey
Reviews.Content: I must be doing something wrong, because I can't get a good picture out of this camera for nothing. Pictures are usually blurry and quality is horrible. I regret the day I bought this piece of crap.

Reviews.Title: lack of technical support
Reviews.Author: William M. Stpierre
Reviews.Content: my 4 month old camera will not charge the battery, there is no technical support to help  you figure out problem.  Kodak had excellant support.  I will never buy an Olympus product again and hope no else does either!

ProductInfo.Features:
Amazingly slim at slightly over -inch thick. Fits practically anywhere so you can capture memories wherever you go.
Tracks faces and automatically focuses and optimizes exposure for sharp, brilliant portrait pictures.
With high ISO sensitivity and faster shutter speeds, Digital Image Stabilization lets you freeze the action to capture sharp
Long-lasting economical shooting power so you'll never miss that important shot.
Capture and share your fondest memories in full motion using Movie with sound.
ProductInfo.Name: Olympus FE-20 8MP Digital Camera (Black)
